components.name: Frontend
components.description: The user interface of the application that allows users to interact with the system.

components.name: Backend API
components.description: The server-side application that processes requests from the frontend and interacts with the database.

components.name: Database
components.description: The storage system that holds application data, including user information and application state.

data_flows.description: User inputs are sent from the frontend to the backend API for processing.
The backend API queries and updates the database based on user requests.
The database returns data to the backend API to fulfill user requests.

trust_boundaries.name: User Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user and the application components, where user input is trusted.

trust_boundaries.name: Application Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the frontend and backend, where data is processed and stored.
